name: Salomon XA Compact Cap - Unisex
description: Light and breezy, this running cap wicks away moisture to keep you cool while keeping the sun out of your eyes. Lightweight and flexible materials can be compacted down and shoved in your pocket when you no longer need it.Made of AdvancedSkin Shield polyester mesh.Weather-repellent fabric add a layer of protection.Flexible brim packs down small.
